Text: Page 211 of the report states: The Dutch tax authority has issued a number of assessments on various issues across the years 2003 to 2016 in relation to various intra-group transactions. The assessments amount to an aggregate net liability across these periods of £902m covering tax, interest and penalties.

Effect: The assessments amount to an aggregate net liability across these periods of £902m covering tax, interest and penalties.
